body: I was tricked!
hmmm... not bad

Really enjoyed It, I wasn't really expecting Mikei (or should I say Mike} to be a trap but It was a pleasant surprise, the art style Is childish yet very sleek looking, I enjoyed the sex scenes as well as the cliche-esque plot, It wasn't the best of the best but It served. The blowjob scene was fantastic as well, though honestly, I would've enjoyed more of an emphasis on the thing. All In all, I rate It 7.5 out of 10. If you truly want to see what a great work Is like then look no further than https://nhentai.net/g/236195/.
If it's a Fox-something it's okay to me tbh. I thought I got trap'd but it was good!
